answers.answer: Good luck today!!!  I will be thinking of you.  I myself have an appt with the new MS specialist.  I am very apprehensive and don't want to go, but I will suck it up and go anyway.  It's at least a 3 month wait to get in to see him if I cancel.  =)I will be thinking of you this afternoon.  Let us know how it goes.(((hugs)))Sarah

Okay ladies... I am thinking of you both. You know we here are anxiously waiting with you. I have been checking this forum nearly everyday waiting for news. (Do I need treatment for that? Wait! Don't answer.) He he~Please know you are not alone and we care so please update when you get a chance.(hugs)

question: Well the day I have or maybe have not been waiting for is today.  Going to see neuro at 3:00 this afternoon for test results of the massive amounts of tests that have been done.  Am prepared for the worst - I think - but is anyone every truly prepared.  But I have been being realstic and know that this could not be a good day.  Got all my blood work back last week and my PCP says that I am one of the healthiest patients she has!  Least I know heart disease or diabetes or liver or kidney failure won't get me!  LOL  Gotta laugh a little today or I could make myself nuts.Will keep you all posted as to what she has to say - and where we go from here.
title: Its test result day
